entry.title: Evangaline Buckley Begins
entry.summary:
Author: Not_Ren_42

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,533Chapters: 14/24Kudos: 199

Summary: Evangaline Buckley has been alone for most of her life. She was unwanted by her parents and left by her sister when she had the first chance. For her most formative years, she had to go to extreme lengths just to get attention from those meant to care for her, failing more often than not. After finding out the truth about her creation, Evie decides that she has to do something – anything. She goes through even more pain and heartbreak before finding herself where she was always meant to end up. -+- This is both a prologue and season 1 rewrite. New chapter every Friday :)

entry.title: but if you're the one for me, then i'll be your hero
entry.summary:
Author: folklorestars

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,204Chapters: 7/10Kudos: 65

Summary: “Let me guess,” Eddie started, smiling faker than ever. “You thought I'd be dying to ride in a car with Evan Buckley as he sings to one of his big hits. A fan's dream come true!” Eddie grinned ear to ear as cheesy as possible. Buck smiled awkwardly, so Eddie continued, “There's just one problem.” “Which is?” “I'm not your fan.” There was that wounded puppy look again. The sad eyes bigger and bluer than ever, mouth drooping down almost into a pout. “You don't... You don't like my music?” “No, I like your music. And I think you’re talented. I'm just not crazy about you like everyone else seems to be,” Eddie clarified. Or; the Buddie Starstruck AU

entry.summary:

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,593Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 11

entry.title: I'm over all the subtlety
entry.summary:
Author: Baileyloves911

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,130Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: A woman at the front desk looks up and smiles brightly. “Welcome in! Checking in?” Buck smiles back easy, charming, bright. “Yeah, Reservation should be under Evan Buckley.” Eddie doesn’t know why, exactly, but something twists in his chest when the woman laughs softly and types. “Got it,” she says, glancing up at Buck. “One bed room.” Eddie freezes. Buck blinks. “Oh no, that’s wrong. I booked two bed” The woman tilts her head, clicks a few things. “It’s showing one king bed.” Buck’s ears turn pink. “That’s… weird. I definitely-“ He glances at Eddie. “I mean, not that I-“ Eddie clears his throat quickly. “It’s fine.” “I mean-if that’s all that’s available,” Eddie says, reaching for the keycard like it’s a lifeline. “It’s fine.” The woman smiles knowingly. Or.Buck and Eddie get invited to a wedding in Colorado and they go as each others dates and feelings get pushed to the edge real fast.

entry.title: Second Chances
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 582,029Chapters: 63/?Kudos: 78

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children who’ve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

entry.title: Evergrowing
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 375,412Chapters: 56/?Kudos: 25

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn’t end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they’re reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: The Price of Power
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 227,165Chapters: 39/?Kudos: 22

Summary: Athena Carter and Bobby Nash couldn’t be more different. She’s the disciplined “good girl” with her future mapped out, while he’s the dangerous bad boy with one foot in college and the other in the streets. When their worlds start to collide, what begins as a bitter rivalry quickly sparks into something deeper neither of them can ignore. But falling for Bobby means stepping into a world Athena never imagined, one ruled by loyalty and violence. That tested everything she thought she knew about herself. As sparks turn to fire, Athena must decide if love is worth the risk of losing everything.

entry.title: Just one more breath
entry.summary:
Author: CarpeDiem911

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 82,067Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 323

Summary: The hysterical laughter stole every coherent thought from Buck and crawled into his bones; his heart thudded and he stared at the doll in disbelief. Then, as suddenly as it had started, the laughter stopped; leaving an eerie silence. Buck stood frozen, his thoughts like thick mud, staring at that stupid doll. He completely missed the huge hole in the wall above the tub. He missed the shadow standing there, watching him from behind the hole with cold eyes and a malicious smile.

entry.title: biting the bullet for you
entry.summary:
Author: playinginthunderstorms

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,031Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 160

Summary: Something's going on here. And Buck sure isn't helping, what with his incessant gazing out the window to where he can see Hen and Eddie collapsing into giggles in each other's arms, Hen grinning widely and Eddie now stripped down to his tank. God, his arms are huge, now. When did that happen? And why didn't Buck notice sooner? Why did he have to notice at all? Things were way better before Buck realized he wanted to sink his teeth into his best friend's biceps and lick the sweat off his neck and eat him out until he cried. (Or, Chris notices something off about Buck and calls him out on it.)

entry.title: Out of the way
entry.summary:
Author: ADOREMAEVE

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,836Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 40

Summary: He felt it more than he heard it, an exhale through the nose, Eddie was close enough that Buck could feel the hot air against his cheek. His hand was once again on Buck’s hip, but he didn’t push or pull. “Move,” he said instead. Buck didn’t– he didn’t even give it a moments thought.“Or what ?” He braced himself instead, tilting his head as he taunted him, watching as Eddie’s jaw tightened and his tongue wet his lips. The grip on his wrist came fast. In one smooth motion, Eddie had turned Buck around and twisted his arm behind his back, pressing him chest-first against the counter. Or the fic where Buck likes Eddie's muscles, and Eddie likes having Buck under him

entry.title: Into the Abyss
entry.summary:
Author: Marie_Nola

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,103Chapters: 19/25Kudos: 289

Summary: With his colleague out sick with the flu, aspiring journalist Evan “Buck” Buckley is sent to interview the crew of station 118 in her place. There he catches the eye of medic Eddie Diaz. A man with a dangerous darkness lurking behind his affable demeanor that draws Buck in like a fly to honey. The two quickly fall into an intense relationship. But when Buck’s past comes back to haunt him, and a new threat looming in the shadows, he faces an impossible choice. Run, or give himself completely into Eddie’s keeping. *Semi inspired by Fifty Shades of Grey, where Buck is an inspiring journalist with a bad relationship track record who finds himself in the crosshairs of a serial killer.
